name: Mutant Fighting Cup 2
description: Evolve, mutate and train your monsters to win the monster championship in hard brutal turn-based strategy battles!
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows 7, Windows 8.1 Classic or Windows 10 Processor: 2.33GHz or faster x86-compatible processor, or Intel Atom™ 1.6GHz or faster processor for netbook class devices Memory: 512 MB RAM Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows 7, Windows 8.1 Classic or Windows 10 Processor: Intel® Core™ Duo 1.83GHz or faster processor Memory: 1 GB RAM Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 500 MB available space
